lines.text: Madame! You may think I'm a coward. I am!
When I married her, she was a brunette. Now you can't believe anything she says.
In Switzerland they have a very peculiar law. When a husband shoots his wife, they put him in jail.
You have a right to be wrong. You're a woman. Women are born to be wrong. I like my women wrong!
I'll be waiting in a taxi on the next corner. Five minutes.

[to Professor Olivier]
Professor, speaking detectively, you're as good as divorced right now.

[to Adolph]
M'sieur, I did so want to see you in tights.
